src:
Bivši košarkaš Zvezde u Koreji!
03 Nov 2019, 13:22 by Milos
Boris Savović ima novi klub.
Bivši košarkaš Crvene zvezde prešao je u redove Gojan Orion Orionsa iz Južne Koreje, potvrdio je menadžer Miško Ražnatović. Orionsi su trenutno deveti na tabeli sa skorom 3:8.
Savović ima 32 godine i igra na poziciji krilnog centra. Tokom karijere igrao je za Hemofarm, Budućnost, Galatasaraj, Crvenu zvezdu, Bajern Minhen, Uln, Turk Telekom, Megu, Veneciju, Zjelonu Goru, a prethodno je nastupao za Avtodor.




POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Former Star basketball player in Korea!
03 Nov 2019, 12:22 by Milos
Boris Savović has a new club.
The former Red Star basketball player has joined the ranks of Gojan Orion Orions from South Korea, confirmed manager Misko Raznatovic. The Orions are currently ninth on the 3: 8 scoring board.
Savovic is 32 years old and plays at the wing center position. During his career, he played for Hemofarm, Budućnost, Galatasaray, Red Star, Bayern Munich, Uln, Turk Telecom, Mega, Venice, Zielona Gora, and previously performed for Avtodor.
